questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes?
Which of the following statements best describes why you use cigarette coupons?
questions.answer: I occasionally use coupons for cigarettes.

questions.question: Where do you usually buy your cigarettes?
How often do you use special in-store cigarette offers?
questions.answer: I look for special offers for my regular brand.

questions.question: If your regular brand were not available, which of the following brands would you consider buying?
Which of the following best describes you?
How long have you smoked this brand?
Are there other smokers in your household 21 years of age or older?
If your regular brand were not available, what would you do?
questions.answer: Go to another store to buy my regular brand.
